landing-page.title: Learn programming by developing games!
landing-page.description: Create your own games with a programming language adapted to your knowledge. Even if it's your first time coding, you can easily build a fun and fully functional game!

difficulty.title: Choose your level!
difficulty.lvl1-descr: First time on this app? Never coded or programmed a game before? This is the right choice to begin!
difficulty.lvl2-descr: You have basic knowledge in programmation and you already programmed few games with this app? Don't wait, go to the next level!
difficulty.lvl3-descr: You already know how to code and game development has no secret for you anymore? You want to enjoy yourself with more freedom in your code? Go for it!
